short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Use Magiccards.info as search for building a deck

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Build your own deck and export it to a reader-friendly and gccg-friendly file format.
You can even see deck stats and draw sample hands!

This extension will only work with magiccards.info
